statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Richard Lee scored 19 points, on 5-of-5 shooting with three 3-pointers, and Tennessee Martin beat Saint Louis 82-76 Wednesday night.
article.headline: Tennessee-Martin grabs 82-76 road win against Saint Louis
article.linkText: Tennessee-Martin grabs 82-76 road win against Saint Louis
article.story: ST. LOUIS -- Richard Lee scored 19 points, on 5-of-5 shooting with three 3-pointers, and Tennessee Martin beat Saint Louis 82-76 Wednesday night. Myles Taylor and Jacolby Mobley each scored 17 points, and Alex Anderson had 16 for UT Martin (4-7). Marcus Bartley hit a 3 for the Billikens with 5:06 remaining to cut UT Martin's lead to 63-60. But the Skyhawks answered with a 6-1 run. Mike Crawford made another 3 for Saint Louis with 57 seconds left to get within five points, but Lee made a free throw and Kedar Edwards had a dunk for an eight-point lead. Miles Reynolds led Saint Louis (5-4) with 19 points, making 11 of 12 from the free-throw line. Crawford had 12 points, Davell Roby 11, and Milik Yarbrough scored 10 to go along with 13 rebounds. Saint Louis now has a 100-32 record at Chaifetz Arena since it opened eight seasons ago.
